meanings.sent1: The honchos of the team made important decisions.
meanings.sent2: The company's honchos gathered for a meeting.
meanings.sent3: The honchos decided to have a pizza party for the staff.
meanings.sent4: She was the honcho of the book club, guiding discussions with ease.
meanings.sent5: The honchos of the tribe wore special hats to show their leadership.

meanings.definition: A person who is influential or important in a particular group or organization
meanings.sent1: The honchos in the music industry can make or break careers.
meanings.sent2: The political honchos met to discuss the upcoming election.
meanings.sent3: The honchos at the office always knew the latest gossip.
meanings.sent4: She became the honcho of the neighborhood watch, keeping everyone safe.
meanings.sent5: The honchos of the fashion world set the trends for the season.
